column4: hmmm is there any way to force nautilus to reload the thumbnails it has stored for videos?
you could empty out ~/.thumbnails, but that'll delete *all* your thumbnails.
probably got them cached in memory...?
nope, it's not even displaying the thumbnails now :| will figure it out :P
er. oops. hope i haven't broken it for you :)
it's rebuilding the cached thumbnails for pics, but not movies :\
